Package org.jhotdraw.gui

Provides general purpose graphical user interface classes leveraging the javax.swing package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Arrangeable Arrangeable.
AttributeField Interface for a field which can be used to edit an attribute of the selected Figures in a DrawingView.
 

Class Summary
AttributeFieldEventHandler Helper class for AttributeField.
JDoubleAttributeField An entry field that can be used to edit a Double attribute of a Figure.
JDoubleAttributeFieldBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
JDoubleAttributeSlider A JSlider that can be used to edit a double attribute of a Figure.
JDoubleAttributeSliderBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
JDoubleTextField A JTextField which only accepts integer values as input.
JDoubleTextFieldBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
JIntegerTextField A JTextField which only accepts integer values as input.
JIntegerTextFieldBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
JPopupButton JPopupButton provides a popup menu.
JPopupButtonBeanInfo BeanInfo for JPopupButton.
JSheet JSheet is a document modal dialog which is displayed below the title bar of a JFrame.
JStringAttributeArea A JTextArea that can be used to edit a String attribute of a Figure.
JStringAttributeAreaBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
JStringAttributeField A JTextField that can be used to edit a String attribute of a Figure.
JStringAttributeFieldBeanInfo BeanInfo for JFigureAttributeField.
MDIDesktopPane An extension of JDesktopPane that supports often used MDI functionality.
PlacardScrollPaneLayout PlacardScrollPaneLayout.
PlacardScrollPaneLayout.UIResource The UI resource version of ScrollPaneLayout.
Worker This is an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated event dispatcher.
 

Enum Summary
Arrangeable.Arrangement  
 

Package org.jhotdraw.gui Description

Provides general purpose graphical user interface classes leveraging the javax.swing package.
